name: The Unstable Comet
description:
The Unstable Comet or The Game Where You Destroy Rocks And Recover The Dust For Science is a game where you are following a comet in your science ship and you have to shoot the incoming rocks to destroy them and recover the dust they generate to transmit the science data about them. Once you get enough data points, they're automatically sent and you get a little health bonus in exchange.

Instructions

Move your ship with the ARROW KEYS or WASD.

* Shoot the rocks with SPACE BAR (only once per second).

* Recover the remains of the destroyed rock for DATA points.

* Enjoy the game!

* (Optional) Beat the developer's highscore of 8335 points!
